mapper.sql: remark AS "remark", detail_id AS "detailId", order_id AS "orderId", sku_id AS "skuId", brand_id AS "brandId", customer_id AS "customerId", preorde_number AS "preordeNumber", purchase_number AS "purchaseNumber", unit_id AS "unitId", one_price AS "onePrice", total_price AS "totalPrice", paper_type AS "paperType", rate AS "rate", delivery_date AS "deliveryDate", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId",arrival_number AS "arrivalNumber",inStock_Number AS "inStockNumber"

DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y-%m' ) AS "month", DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y' ) AS "year", COUNT(DISTINCT seller_id) AS "sellerCount", COUNT(DISTINCT sku_id) AS "skuCount", SUM(purchase_number) AS "purchaseNumber", sum(total_price)AS "totalPrice", create_time AS "craeteTime"

DATE_FORMAT( detail.create_time, '%Y-%m' ) AS "month", DATE_FORMAT( detail.create_time, '%Y' ) AS "year", COUNT(DISTINCT detail.seller_id) AS "sellerCount", COUNT(DISTINCT detail.sku_id) AS "skuCount", SUM(detail.purchase_number) AS "purchaseNumber", sum(detail.total_amount)AS "totalPrice", detail.create_time AS "createTime", if(( SUM(detail.total_amount) - if( payment.payment_amount is null , 0 ,payment.payment_amount ) ) < 0,0,( SUM(detail.total_amount) - if( payment.payment_amount is null , 0 ,payment.payment_amount ) )) AS "deficientPrice", payment.payment_amount AS "paymentPrice", SUM(detail.inStock_number) AS "inStockCount", if(SUM(detail.purchase_number) is null or round(SUM(detail.inStock_number)) is null ,0,round(SUM(detail.inStock_number)/SUM(detail.purchase_number)*100)) AS "inStockRate"

orderDetail . detail_id AS "detailId", orderDetail.order_id AS "orderId", orderDetail.sku_id AS "skuId", orderDetail.brand_id AS "brandId", orderDetail.customer_id AS "customerId", orderDetail.preorde_number AS "preordeNumber", orderDetail.purchase_number AS "purchaseNumber", orderDetail.unit_id AS "unitId", orderDetail.one_price AS "onePrice", orderDetail.total_price AS "totalPrice", orderDetail.paper_type AS "paperType", orderDetail.rate AS "rate", orderDetail.delivery_date AS "deliveryDate", orderDetail.create_user AS "createUser", orderDetail.update_user AS "updateUser", orderDetail.create_time AS "createTime", orderDetail.update_time AS "updateTime", orderDetail.display AS "display", orderDetail.deptId AS "deptId" , planDetail.production_plan_detail_id AS "planDetailId"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_crm_order_detail where 1 = 1
and detail_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.detailId},'%')
and order_id = #{paramCondition.orderId}
and sku_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuId},'%')
and brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.brandId},'%')
and customer_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.customerId},'%')
and paper_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.paperType},'%')

SELECT tableTmp.`YEAR` AS "year", tableTmp.`MONTH` AS "month", pay.total_amount AS "totalPrice", pay.payment_amount AS "paymentPrice", pay.total_amount - pay.payment_amount AS "deficientPrice", customerCount.customerCount AS "sellerCount", skuCount.skuCount AS "skuCount", tableTmp.purchase_number AS "purchaseNumber", tableTmp.inStock_number AS "inStockCount", tableTmp.instockRate AS "inStockRate", tableTmp.create_time AS "createTime" FROM ( ( SELECT `month`, `year`, SUM( total_amount ) AS total_amount, sum( one_price ) AS one_price, sum( purchase_number ) AS purchase_number, sum( inStock_number ) AS inStock_number, ROUND( sum( inStock_number )/ sum( purchase_number )* 100 ) AS instockRate , create_time FROM view_order_detail GROUP BY `MONTH` ) tableTmp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT `MONTH`, COUNT( DISTINCT sku_id ) AS skuCount FROM view_order_detail GROUP BY `MONTH` ) AS skuCount ON tableTmp.`MONTH` = skuCount. MONTH LEFT JOIN ( SELECT `MONTH`, COUNT( DISTINCT customer_id ) AS customerCount FROM view_order_detail GROUP BY `MONTH` ) AS customerCount ON tableTmp.`MONTH` = customerCount. MONTH LEFT JOIN ( SELECT payment.`MONTH`, sum( payment.payment_amount ) AS payment_amount, sum( payment.total_amount ) AS total_amount FROM ( SELECT v.`MONTH`, v.total_amount, p.payment_amount FROM view_order_detail v LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM( payment_amount ) AS payment_amount, order_id AS order_id FROM daoxin_crm_payment_record WHERE 1 = 1 AND display = 1 AND `status` = 0 GROUP BY order_id ) p ON v.order_id = p.order_id GROUP BY v.order_id ) payment GROUP BY payment.`MONTH` ) pay ON tableTmp.`MONTH` = pay.MONTH ) WHERE 1 = 1
and year = #{paramCondition.year}

SELECT tableTmp.`YEAR` AS "year", tableTmp.`MONTH` AS "month", pay.total_amount AS "totalPrice", pay.payment_amount AS "paymentPrice", pay.total_amount - pay.payment_amount AS "deficientPrice", customerCount.customerCount AS "sellerCount", skuCount.skuCount AS "skuCount", tableTmp.purchase_number AS "purchaseNumber", tableTmp.inStock_number AS "inStockCount", tableTmp.instockRate AS "inStockRate", tableTmp.create_time AS "createTime", tableTmp.money AS "invoiceMoney" FROM ( ( SELECT `month`, `year`, SUM( total_amount ) AS total_amount, sum( one_price ) AS one_price, sum( purchase_number ) AS purchase_number, sum( inStock_number ) AS inStock_number, ROUND( sum( inStock_number )/ sum( purchase_number )* 100 ) AS instockRate, create_time FROM view_order_detail GROUP BY `year` ) tableTmp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT `year`, COUNT( DISTINCT sku_id ) AS skuCount FROM view_order_detail GROUP BY `year` ) AS skuCount ON tableTmp.`year` = skuCount. year LEFT JOIN ( SELECT `year`, COUNT( DISTINCT customer_id ) AS customerCount FROM view_order_detail GROUP BY `year` ) AS customerCount ON tableTmp.`year` = customerCount. year LEFT JOIN ( SELECT payment.`year`, sum( payment.payment_amount ) AS payment_amount, sum( payment.total_amount ) AS total_amount FROM ( SELECT v.`year`, v.total_amount, p.payment_amount FROM view_order_detail v LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM( payment_amount ) AS payment_amount, order_id AS order_id FROM daoxin_crm_payment_record WHERE 1 = 1 AND display = 1 AND `status` = 0 GROUP BY order_id ) p ON v.order_id = p.order_id GROUP BY v.order_id ) payment GROUP BY payment.`year` ) pay ON tableTmp.`year` = pay.year ) WHERE 1 = 1
and tableTmp.year = #{paramCondition.year}

select
from daoxin_crm_order_detail where 1 = 1
and detail_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.detailId},'%')
and order_id #{paramCondition.orderId}
and sku_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuId},'%')
and brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.brandId},'%')
and customer_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.customerId},'%')
and paper_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.paperType},'%')

select
from daoxin_crm_order_detail where 1 = 1
and detail_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.detailId},'%')
and order_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.orderId},'%')
and sku_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuId},'%')
and brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.brandId},'%')
and customer_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.customerId},'%')
and paper_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.paperType},'%')
and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') >= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.startTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')
and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') <= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.endTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')

select
from daoxin_crm_order_detail where 1 = 1
and detail_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.detailId},'%')
and order_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.orderId},'%')
and sku_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuId},'%')
and brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.brandId},'%')
and customer_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.customerId},'%')
and paper_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.paperType},'%')
